channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For Americans, the love for chain restaurants runs deep
item.description: Some of the nation's largest restaurants boast of decades-long survival through economic downturns, stiffer competition, and changing American palates...

item.title: Hong Kong court convicts pro-democracy activist and mogul Jimmy Lai
item.description: The business mogul and activist has been in ailing health and has already spent more than 1,800 days in solitary confinement in Hong Kong before his g...

item.title: What's behind the wellness claims for the synthetic dye methylene blue?
item.description: Taking drops of a medical dye is trending in wellness and biohacking circles. Some influencers claim it boosts longevity and brain health. Scientists ...

item.title: Houses floated away in this Alaska Native village. Now residents want to move
item.description: Kwigillingok, Alaska, has long grappled with erosion and flooding. Residents want to move to higher ground, further inland, especially after the remna...

item.title: Rob Reiner and his wife found dead in Los Angeles home
item.description: Director-actor Rob Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead Sunday at Reiner's Los Angeles home, according to a law enforcement official.

item.title: Jimmy Lai, Hong Kong pro-democracy activist, convicted in landmark trial
item.description: Hong Kong pro-democracy activist Jimmy Lai, an outspoken critic of Beijing, was convicted in a landmark national security trial. He faces a possible l...

item.title: Pro-democracy Hong Kong tycoon Jimmy Lai convicted in high-profile national security trial
item.description: The 78-year-old UK citizen was convicted of lobbying foreign governments to impose sanctions on HK and China.

item.title: A 10-year-old, two rabbis and a Holocaust survivor - Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
item.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

item.title: 'Person of interest' detained over Brown University shooting to be released, officials say
item.description: Two people died and nine others were injured in the incident in Rhode Island on Saturday.

item.title: Suspects in deadly Bondi Beach attack identified as father and son
item.description: A 50-year-old suspect in the Bondi beach shooting was shot and killed by police and his 24-year-old son, who was investigated previously, is in a coma...

item.title: "Slop" chosen as Merriam-Webster's 2025 word of the year
item.description: "Slop," which refers to creepy, zany and demonstrably fake content, has landed the title of Merriam-Webster's 2025 word of the year.

item.title: At least 15 killed in targeted attack on Jewish Australians, police say
item.description: At least 15 people were killed at a Jewish gathering on Australia's Bondi Beach, according to Australian government officials and police. One of two g...

item.title: What we know so far about the Brown University shooting
item.description: The identities of those killed or injured have not yet been released, but the university said all the victims were students.

item.title: Hollywood director Rob Reiner and wife Michele found dead in LA home
item.description: He directed classic films including The Princess Bride, This is Spinal Tap and When Harry Met Sally.

item.title: Australia terror attack raises questions about police preparedness
item.description: The deadly terror attack at Bondi Beach in Sydney comes amid a significant spike in antisemitic rhetoric and attacks in Australia.

item.title: A Brown University student survived being shot in high school. Then came the active shooter alerts
Authorities say they will release person of interest detained in Brown University shooting
item.description: Officials in Providence say they will release a person of interest detained in a Brown University shooting that killed two students and injured nine.

item.title: Photos show police investigation of a shooting at Brown University
